SELECT c.*, u.nickname `user.nickname`, tou.id `toUser.id`, tou.nickname `toUser.nickname`, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sc_comment WHERE to_id = c.id AND deleted = 0) commentNum, IF(pn.number IS null,0,pn.number) praiseNum FROM sc_comment c LEFT JOIN sc_user u on u.id = c.user_id LEFT JOIN sc_comment toc on toc.id = c.to_id LEFT JOIN sc_user tou on tou.id = toc.user_id LEFT JOIN sc_praise_num pn on pn.module = 1 AND pn.relative_id = c.id WHERE c.module=1 AND c.relative_id=#{relativeId} AND c.deleted=0 ${index} ${item} LIMIT #{offset},#{limit}
